text: Giichi Arima (有馬 義一)(September, 1911 - July 3, 1993) was a baseball player in Japan. He played for the Taiyo Whales (now the Yokohama DeNA BayStars) in the Japan Central League, and also managed them for part of 1951. == References == Category:1911 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Managers of baseball teams in Japan Category:Yokohama DeNA BayStars managers
title: Giichi Arima
